titles.title: Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary” / Täʾamrä Mikaʾel “Miracles of Michael”

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary” (fols. 3ra-76ra, 78rb-82rb) I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fols. 3ra-6va) I-2) Täʾamrä Maryam: 76 miracles (fols. 6va-8va, 11va-76ra, 78rb-82rb) I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki … “I worship Thee…” (fols. 8va-9rb l.5) I-4) Introductory exhortation and hymns (fols. 9rb l.6-11rb) I-5) ʾAkkonu bǝʾǝsi… “Does not the man…” (distributed among the miracles of Mary, fols. 12va-48ra) II) Täʾamrä Mikaʾel “Miracles of Michael”: 4 miracles (fols. 76ra-78rb)
Additio 1.

donors.donor: According to Additio 1 Täsfa Mikaʾel donated the Ms. to Maryam ʾAndel. He is also mentioned in the supplication formulas. In addition, the name of Wälättä ʾƎgziʾ is written in the supplication formula on fol. 44vb.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is worn. The cover is torn off from the spine. The sewing is destroyed and has been crudely repaired with several modern threads. Many fols. are affected by humidity. Fol. 40 has been enlarged by sewing a piece of parchment onto it.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather (partly missing); Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover is poorly visible (at least 5 tools were used: cross-hatching, double circle, fourfold line fillet, x-form, small x).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and to the tail of the codex.

inks.ink: Black, red (strong vermilion, vivid vermilion) ink.

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(8/fols. 3r-10v) – II(8/fols. 11r-18v) – III(8/fols. 19r-26v) – IV(9; s.l.: 5, stub after 5/fols. 27r-35v) – V(8/fols. 36r-43v) – VI(8/fols. 44r-51v) – VII(8/fols. 52r-59v) – VIII(8/fols. 60r-67v) – IX(8; s.l. 1, stub after 7; 8, stub before 1/fols. 68r-75v) – X(3; s.l. 1, stub after 3/fols. 76r-78v) – XI(5; s.l. 5, stub before 1/fols. 79r-83v).

taunit.rl-info:
Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The scribe did not use the last ruled line on fol. 39va The scribe disregarded the ruling on fols. 6ra, 13va.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra, name of the archangel Mikaʾel in Texts I and II, name of the donor (fol. 11va); elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals. Two lines on the incipit page of Text I; two initial lines of Texts I-3, first word of Text I-4; first word of subsections of Text I-1; two initial lines of subsections of Texts I-2 and II (miracles); a few initial words in the incipit of a subsection of Text I-4; first word or first letters of each strophe of Text I-5.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ለዓ፡ አ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 8ra) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 16vb, 23ra) ለዓለ፡ አ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 43rb) ለዓለ፡ አሜ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 37vb, 44vb)ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 17va, 27ra, 41ra) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 13ra, 15vb, 23va, 25vb, 33ra, 33vb, 37ra, 46ra, 47vb) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 14vb, 19va, 21ra, 22ra, 31vb, 34va) ለዓለ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 28ra, 30va) ለዓለመ፡ አ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 8va) ለዓለመ፡ ዓ፡ ዓሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 18vb) ለዓለመ፡ ዓለ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 14ra) ለዓለመ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 11rb, 28vb, 38vb) ለዓለመ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 12va).

otherdetails.otherdetail: Some miracles in Text I-2 are followed by an ʾarke-hymn: - ለዘዘነብር፡ መነኮስ፡ በደሴተ፡ ጤግሮስ፡ ፈለግ። … (fol. 48vb) - ለፊላታዎስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ሰሚረኪ፡ ጽድቆ። … (fol. 51rb-va) - ከመ፡ ጸሐፈ፡ ደቅስዮስ፡ ተአምረኪ፡ እሉደ። … (fol. 52ra) - ብእሲ፡ አረማዊ፡ ኀበ፡ ሥዕልኪ፡ ተሪቦ። … (fol. 53rb-va) - መበለት፡ ሠናይት፡ ጊዜ፡ ትጸሊ፡ ጸሎተ። … (fol. 54vb-55ra) - ግርማ፡ ተአምሪኪ፡ እግዝእትየ፡ ጥቀ፡ ይበድር፡ ፍጥና። … (fol. 56rb) - ሰሚዖ፡ ሕፃን፡ ለእሙ፡ ገዓራ። … (fol. 59ra-b) - ብእሲ፡ አረማዊ፡ መዝገበ፡ ዓመፃ፡ ወእከይ። … (fol. 66vb) - እምድኅረ፡ ሞተት፡ ወለት፡ ዘትሰመይ፡ ዲና። … (fol. 70vb) Text I-4 includes the hymns: - ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bä-kǝlʾe Maryam wäladitä ʾamlak ʾǝmmu lä-ʾǝgziʾǝnä ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali … “O my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary, Godbearing, Mother of our Lord Jesus Christ the Almighty …” (fol. 10vb, l. 4-19) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bä-kǝlʾe Maryam wäladitä ʾamlak ʾǝmmä bǝrhan ʾǝmmä qwǝrban … “Salutation to you, o my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary, Goldbearing, Mother of the Light, Mother of the Eucharist…” (fols. 10vb, l. 19-11ra) Text I-5 comprises 32 strophes, which are strophes 1-31, 33 according to GrohHymn pp. 336-51.

additional.cont: Fol. 82rb: Donation note.
additional.det: The note states that Täsfa Mikaʾel donated the Ms. to the church of Maryam ʾAndel. The note also lists the name of Täsfa Mikaʾel´s family members (the name of his wife, Wälättä Sǝllase, has been inserted interlineally in the same hand). The word Maryam is hardly readable due to faded red ink.

extras.extra: - Many omitted letters or words are inserted interlineally, in the main hand: e.g., fols. 11rb, 17rb, 24ra-b, 31ra, 39vb, 41ra, 48rb, 60ra, 75ra-b, 79vb. - Omitted letters written in blue pen in a secondary hand: fols. 21rb, 70ra, 75vb. - Immediate corrections indicated by thin black lines above and below the letters: fols. 6vb, 10ra. - Many scribbles: e.g., fols. 1r-v, 2r-v, 13v, 51r, 58v, 72v, 79r, 82r-v, 83r-v. - Crude drawing in blue pen on fol. 1r.

frames.frame: Fol. 3r: (incipit page of Text I-1): uncoloured ornamental band; interlaces, zoomorphic motifs (birds).
